post.body: I don't usually watch that show, but best quote from tonight: "We all have ways of coping. I used sex and awesomeness."
Yay + thank you! Can't wait to see you!
Because the people there are soul-crushingly horrible! Do not be enticed!
Any chance you can say hi on your way back?
Publix! Farmer's Market produce rots too fast. It helps the comparison that in the Bible, Jesus is always loading up on carbs.
My children: Orly, Srsly, Canhas, and Bukkit. Oh, I crack myself up. Back to homework!!!
Looking up baby names (don't ask), and ran across ORLY. Was really shooting for the definition to be "Lolspeak for 'Oh really.'"
So glad to see Vickie, Sarah, and Jeff in Athens this weekend. Feeling a lot better about a lot of things.
Got a neck message from a cabby. Classy.
I'm an unfunny girl... writing a funny speech. What a disaster. Plz 2 cancel today?
I am the tomato in a bad mood / not doing homework / having weird thoughts sandwich.
A great title for a book on lesbianism would be "Girl on girl," because it suggests a girl talking about girl issues.. and also scissoring.
"Mom, may I please be excused for a cigarette?" I love my brother.
Flailing is a form of reaching out, even if you accidentally drown those who try to help.
Ordered some new jewelry for teh piercing!!
According to William, I'm a tyrannosaurus rex at Scrabble. I said "No! Tyrannosaurus TEXT!" I laughed. He didn't. Hehe.
I'm reading my palm off a website, and I gotta say, it's not looking good. Two marriages, an affair, and a crisis late in life.
Birthday, birthday, birthday! I made it out of clay! And when it's dry and ready, with my BIRTHDAY I WILL PLAY.
I'll be 23 on Tuesday! Squeeeee!
Chicken wings, Magic Hat #9, new episodes of the Office and Sarah Silverman. Is a happy girl.
There's a hole in my puppy, dear Liza, dear Liza, there's a hole in my puppy, dear Liza, a hole!
Apparently, me mouthing the words to the Alvin and the Chipmunks Christmas CD blows my dog's mind. What's goin onnn?!?!?
I'm not their friend, so they won't help me out. And my work suffers for it. Story of my fucking life.
Freaking out about panel. Someone reassure me that everything I create isn't total shit.
Drama.
I want a blue sky... and some carbs.
I just bought more fruit than Jesus.
Starting a week-long fruit and protein diet tomorrow. Shit. Trainer says I'll lose a lot, but I'll be a bitch since I'll be so damn hungry.
In love with my Perrier radio ads... and Kelly's awesome "fancy" voice in them! Love.
